\begin{eqnarray}
\Phi&=&\rho+(\theta\xi)+\frac{1}{2}\theta^2 D\nonumber\\
V_\alpha&=&i(\hskip .25cm/\hskip -.25cm A\theta)_\alpha+\frac{1}{2}\theta^2\chi_\alpha,
\

\begin{eqnarray}
G&=&\Phi+iD^\alpha V_\alpha\\
&=&\rho+(\theta\lambda)+\frac{1}{2}\theta^2 D^2+i\partial_\mu A_\nu
(\theta\gamma^\mu\gamma^\nu\theta)\nonumber,
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\int d^2\theta D^\beta G D_\beta \overline G&=&
-\frac{1}{2} F^{\mu\nu}F_{\mu\nu}+i\overline\lambda\hskip .25cm/\hskip -.25cm\partial\lambda
+\partial_\mu\rho\partial^\mu\rho+D^2\nonumber\\
&&+\left(\partial^\mu A_\mu\right)^2+\mbox{surface term},
\

\begin{eqnarray}\label{lgauge}
{\cal L}_{gauge}&=&\frac{1}{2}\int d^2\theta D^\beta G D_\beta \overline G\nonumber\\
&=&-\frac{1}{4}F^{\mu\nu}F_{\mu\nu}+\frac{i}{2}\overline\lambda\hskip .25cm/\hskip -.25cm\partial\lambda
+\frac{1}{2} \partial_\mu\rho\partial^\mu\rho+\frac{1}{2} D^2.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\left.D^\alpha QV_\alpha\overline Q\right|_{\theta^2}&=&-\frac{1}{2}\theta^2
\left(\overline\phi(\psi\chi)-\overline\phi A_\mu\partial^\mu\phi+i\overline\psi\hskip .25cm/\hskip -.25cm
A\psi\right)\nonumber\\
\left.Q\Phi\overline Q\right|_{\theta^2}&=&\frac{1}{2}\theta^2
\left(\phi\overline\phi D-\phi\overline\psi\xi-\overline\phi\psi\xi+\rho\phi\overline
F+\rho\overline\phi F-
\rho\overline\psi\psi\right)\nonumber\\
\left.QV^\alpha V_\alpha\overline Q\right|_{\theta^2}&=&-\theta^2\phi\overline\phi
A^\mu A_\mu,
\

\begin{eqnarray}\label{lmat}
{\cal L}_{matter}
&=&\frac{1}{2}\int d^2\theta\left\{(D^\alpha-igV^\alpha)Q(D_\alpha+igV_\alpha)\overline Q
+2gQ\Phi\overline Q\right\}\nonumber\\
&=&\frac{i}{2}\overline\psi\hskip .25cm/\hskip -.25cm D\psi+\frac{1}{2} D_\mu\phi
D^\mu\overline\phi-\frac{g}{2}(\phi\overline\psi\overline\lambda+
\overline\phi\psi\lambda)-\frac{g}{2}\rho\overline\psi\psi\nonumber\\
&&+\frac{g}{2}\phi\overline\phi D+\frac{1}{2} F\overline F+\frac{g}{2}\rho\phi\overline F+\frac{g}{2}\rho\overline\phi F,
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\overline F+g\rho\overline\phi&=&0\nonumber\\
D+\frac{g}{2}\phi\overline\phi&=&0,
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\left({\cal L}_{gauge}+{\cal L}_{matter}\right)_{pot}&=&
\frac{1}{2} D^2+\frac{g}{2}\phi\overline\phi D+\frac{1}{2} F\overline F+\frac{g}{2}\rho\overline\phi F+
\frac{g}{2}\rho\phi\overline F\nonumber\\
&=&-\frac{g^2}{2}\rho^2\phi\overline\phi-\frac{g^2}{8}(\phi\overline\phi)^2.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\Phi^a&=&\rho^a+(\theta\xi^a)+\frac{1}{2}\theta^2D^a\nonumber\\
